thread.title: Hezbollah Fired Missile at Greek Catholic Church in Israel on Day After Christmas: IDF - The Messenger
thread.title_full: Hezbollah Fired Missile at Greek Catholic Church in Israel on Day After Christmas: IDF - The Messenger

author: Fatma Khaled
title: Hezbollah Fired Missile at Greek Catholic Church in Israel on Day After Christmas: IDF - The Messenger
text: [Florida Woman Sues Hershey’s For $5 Billion Over Reese’s Pumpkins Not Having Jack-o-Lantern Faces](/news/hersheys-class-action-florida-5-billion-reeses-peanut-butter-jack-o-lantern-faces?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=trending_story) Hezbollah Fired Missile at Greek Catholic Church in Israel on Day After Christmas: IDF The apparent missile strike came amid increased fire on the Lebanon-Israel border [Fatma Khaled](/author/fatma-khaled) The Israel Defense Forces said on Tuesday that the Lebanese militant group Hezbollah fired an anti-tank missile from Lebanon, striking St. Mary’s Greek Church of Iqrit in northern Israel. The [IDF said on X](https://twitter.com/IDF/status/1739630534416838750?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1739630534416838750%7Ctwgr%5E9a969ef7bdcddfa5450d2c16354d0085f36b2fae%7Ctwcon%5Es1_&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.timesofisrael.com%2Fliveblog_entry%2Fidf-confirms-hezbollah-anti-tank-missile-hit-greek-orthodox-church-in-northern-israel%2F), formerly Twitter, that the missile that struck the church injured one civilian, but didn’t mention damage to the church or its surrounding structures. A video clip of a missile attack published by Hezbollah was the strike in question, according to Israel. The video appears to show a missile hitting a structure near a church, though it could not be independently confirmed. St. Mary’s Church of Iqrit is a Greek Catholic church, [according to Greek news agency AMNA](https://www.amna.gr/home/article/785932/I-Chezmpolach-eplixe-ekklisia-sto-boreio-Israil). The IDF erroneously said it was a Greek Orthodox church. Iqrit is a [Christian village](https://www.washingtonpost.com/archive/politics/1994/01/20/2-weeks-that-turned-into-45-years/132b3bfa-f8d1-4362-8b29-22b034360b5f/) located 16 miles northeast of Acre, a port city northwest Israel. Israeli officials said that the Dec. 26 strike injured nine soldiers, [the Jerusalem Post reported](https://www.jpost.com/breaking-news/article-779617). In retaliatory response, the IDF struck Hezbollah infrastructure in Lebanon, including a building where one of the group’s fighters was hiding. Hezbollah didn’t claim responsibility for the attack on the church as of Friday morning, but the [Greek City Times](https://greekcitytimes.com/2023/12/27/hezbollah-northern-israel-catholic/), [RT Arabic](https://abcnews.go.com/International/wireStory/gaza-war-grinds-tensions-soar-israels-volatile-northern-105973045), and [Beirut 24](https://www.beirut24.org/2023/11/20/%D8%A7%D9%84%D8%AD%D8%B2%D8%A8-%D8%A7%D8%B3%D8%AA%D9%87%D8%AF%D9%81-%D8%AB%D9%83%D9%86%D8%A9-%D8%A8%D8%B1%D8%A7%D9%86%D9%8A%D8%AA-%D8%A8%D8%B5%D8%A7%D8%B1%D9%88%D8%AE%D9%8A-%D8%A8%D8%B1%D9%83%D8%A7/) reported that the group claimed responsibility for attacking military targets Tuesday in northern Israel, which [borders Lebanon](https://abcnews.go.com/International/wireStory/gaza-war-grinds-tensions-soar-israels-volatile-northern-105973045). Alex Gandler, Israeli Deputy spokesperson Ministry of Foreign Affairs, said on Tuesday that the strike violates international law. [Hezbollah Fires on Israelis Rescuing Man Injured in Strike on Church in Northern Israel](/news/hezbollah-greek-orthodox-church-rocket-attack-northern-israel?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) [Hezbollah Fires Rockets at North Israel After Airstrike Kills 5 of Group’s Senior Fighters](/news/hezbollah-fires-rockets-at-north-israel-after-airstrike-kills-5-of-groups-senior-fighters?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) [Israel Sends Warning to Lebanon: Tell Hezbollah to Back Off or Face War](/news/israel-hezbollah-lebanon-warning-north-rocket-attacks?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) [IDF Claims New Video Shows Israel Hitting Hezbollah Targets](/news/newly-released-video-idf-israel-hezbollah-targets?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) [Israel Sections off Territory on Lebanon Border After Exchanging Fire With Hezbollah](/news/israel-gaza-hezbollah-lebanon-border-battleground-hamas?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) [Catholic Priest Stabbed to Death Inside Nebraska Church](/news/catholic-priest-stabbed-to-death-inside-nebraska-church-stephen-gutgsell?utm_source=onsite&utm_medium=related_story) “This attack is not only a clear violation of @UN Security Council Resolution 1701, but also a violation of the freedom of worship,” [he tweeted](https://twitter.com/AlexGandler/status/1739637713903505554?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1739637713903505554%7Ctwgr%5E5771c16fa85801e263e5800b820cf3b493de1934%7Ctwcon%5Es1_&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fgreekcitytimes.com%2F2023%2F12%2F27%2Fhezbollah-northern-israel-catholic%2F). Since the Israel-Hamas war broke out in October, the IDF [struck the Saint Porphyrius Church](https://themessenger.com/news/israel-admits-its-airstrike-damaged-historic-gaza-church-where-officials-say-18-were-killed), a Greek-Orthodox church Gaza City, killing 18 people and injuring nearly 100 others. Earlier this month, The Latin Patriarchate of Jerusalem, which oversees Catholic parishes in the Palestinian territories, Israel, Jordan and Cyprus, [said](https://www.lpj.org/en/news/gaza-16th-december-2023) that an IDF sniper [killed two wome](https://themessenger.com/news/palestinian-christians-gaza-fear-extinction-israel-hamas-war)n in a Gaza church.
